official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the minimum coverage under the Government life insurance policies for civil service retirees from 25 percentum to 40 percentum.

summary.text: Increases the minimum value to which the continued life insurance of a retired or disabled Federal employee may be reduced.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the minimum coverage under the Government life insurance policies for civil service retirees from 25 percentum to 40 percentum.
